title: TuneUp Utilities 2014 v14.0.1000.145 with Key [TorDigger]
description:
TuneUp Utilities 2014

TuneUp Utilities 2014 - An updated set of various tools for tuning your system. TuneUp Utilities allow you to clean the wheels of a different litter, remove from the registry invalid entries, manage startup to optimize memory, permanently delete files using the tool "TuneUp Shredder" (it is not possible to restore files, even with special programs), to change the appearance of Windows, and much more. All utilities are collected in a single graphical environment. This package contains the important functions for the configuration, optimization of the system, cleaning and maintenance-friendly graphical interface.

TuneUp stands out due to its ease of use. During development, the main emphasis was placed on providing opportunities for each level Windows users to optimize their computer efficiently and completely. The following is a brief overview of the most important new features:
TuneUp Turbo Mode. TuneUp Turbo Mode gives you immediate performance boost whenever you need it. It disables many features that work in the background, even when you are not using them.
TuneUp Operational Optimization . TuneUp Utilities offer you two new optimization method, which ensures optimum performance even under high load computer. If necessary, the speed will increase or accelerate the process of running the program.
Gadget TuneUp Utilities. For Windows Vista and Windows 7, there is now a device TuneUp Utilities, which always displays the status of the computer desktop.
TuneUp Optimization Report. TuneUp Utilities will provide you with progress reports will show you what services and other optimization problems you have done and what benefits it has brought you.
The main window. TuneUp Utilities have been completely renovated: new main window is even easier to use and provides faster access to each function.
Adapting to Windows 7. TuneUp Utilities fully supports the new operating system Windows 7. Just like Windows XP and Vista. TuneUp Utilities also performed on 64-bit versions of Windows 7.
Even more extensive options Automatic Maintenance. Automatic service and fast solution to the problems now do more maintenance tasks. You can also specify a starting automatic maintenance when you are not actively working in the computer and - (laptop) - when it is connected to a power source.
Disk defragmenter. The new TuneUp Utilities is now offering you two ways to defragment your hard drive: full and fast.
More defrag registry. The previous version of the registry was supposed to be defragmented after analysis at reboot. The new TuneUp Utilities, you can now put this optimization to the next start your computer, and you can not interrupt their work for this.
When space became even more secure. You can now delete unwanted files and old backups separately from each other in order to free up disk space on your hard drive. This allows you to safely remove redundant files at any time. After each treatment, TuneUp Utilities also show you how much disk space has been freed.
Easier to use. Many functions of TuneUp Utilities have become more easy to use, making it easier for you to optimize your system Windows.
Detailed information about your programs. TuneUp Utilities provides you with a detailed description of all programs installed on your computer. If you would like to find out more information about one of your programs, you can get search results on the network.

Supported Platforms : 

Windows  2003, Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1 (32 and 64-bit)
Language: English

Homepage: http://www.tune-up.com/

Installation Instructions:

- Install program.
- Register Application with given serial with any name and organization.
- Done, Enjoy.

Have A Nice Day
